attributes.action: Force Online Gambling sites to be more accountable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government need to force online gambling sites to be more accountable.  Limit people to the amount of money they can deposit a month.  If they try to unsubscirbe to their mailings they must be removed.  Online Gambling sites should not be allowed to send any unsolicited mail, children are vulnerable and impressionable they need protecting from online gambling
